mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task (user_id, exchange, routing_key, message_id, message, state, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{exchange}, #{routingKey}, #{messageId}, #{message}, #{state}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, exchange, routing_key, message_id, message, state FROM task WHERE state = 'fail' OR (state = 'create' AND update_time < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 MINUTE)) LIMIT 20
